doc.after: Airport police units are a security police agency assigned to perform law enforcement functions at airports They provide a wide range of law enforcement duties and responsibilities including patrol investigation traffic flow management and control and response to airport emergencies 1 Airport police provide enhanced safety to airport employees and to passengers Officers can be found at security gates throughout the terminal area and around the airport s perimeter 2
